name: ticket
label: The tracking number within the system. Project specific. Sequentially assigned upon receipt.

name: mc_number_anon
label: The (anonymized) number assigned by the editorial workflow system (Manuscript Central/ ScholarOne) to a manuscript. This is purged by a script of any revision suffixes.

name: assignee_anon
label: Anonymized assignee name (time-varying)

name: date_created
label: Creation date of issue

name: received
label: An indicator for whether the issue is just created and has not been assigned to a replicator yet.

name: Journal
label: Journal associated with an issue and manuscript. Derived from the manuscript number. Possibly updated by hand

name: Status
label: Status associated with a ticket at any point in time. The schema for these has changed over time.

name: external
label: An indicator for whether the issue required  external validation.

name: Resolution
label: Resolution associated with a ticket at the end of the reproducibility check.

name: reason.failure
label: A list of reasons for failure to fully reproduce.

name: MCRecommendation
label: Decision status when the issue is Revise and Resubmit.

name: MCRecommendationV2
label: Decision status when the issue is conditionally accepted.

name: External.party.name
label: Name of the external party. Usually only institutional names.

name: Non.compliant
label: An indicator for whether the issue is non-compliant for some reason.

name: DCAF_Access_Restrictions
label: Category of Access Restrictions (2 categories)

name: DCAF_Access_Restrictions_V2
label: Category of Access Restrictions (4 categories)

name: Update.type
label: Who initiated the need to update the replication package

name: Software.used
label: Manually coded software used in the replication package

name: Agreement.signed
label: Type of agreements signed by Data Editor to obtain private data

name: MCStatus
label: Status of the manuscript in the editorial workflow system.

name: As.Of.Date
label: Date and time stamp of the issue transaction

name: date_asof
label: Date part of the issue transaction

name: date_resolved
label: The date the issue was resolved.
